questions.question: Which country does the beneficiary applying from?
questions.suggestedAnswer: The beneficiary is currently applying from {{beneficiary_country}}.
questions.guidance: Provide the country where the beneficiary resides currently.
questions.tooltip: Officers need to know the applicant's current location to determine consulate jurisdiction and visa processing rules.

questions.question: What is your date of marriage?
questions.suggestedAnswer: Our marriage took place on {{marriage_date}}.
questions.guidance: Provide the official date as per your marriage certificate.
questions.tooltip: Officers verify the marriage date to ensure consistency with other submitted documents.

questions.question: Where did the marriage take place (city & country)?
questions.suggestedAnswer: The marriage took place in {{marriage_location}}, and it was conducted according to our cultural and legal practices.
questions.guidance: Provide the full city and country.
questions.tooltip: Officers check the marriage location for authenticity and eligibility purposes.

questions.question: How and where did you first meet your spouse?
questions.suggestedAnswer: We first met {{how_did_you_meet}}, and our connection developed naturally over time through regular communication and shared values.
questions.guidance: Focus on how the relationship developed naturally.
questions.tooltip: Officers assess whether the relationship started naturally and is genuine.

questions.question: When and where did you first meet in person?
questions.suggestedAnswer: We first met in person {{first_in_person_meeting}}, which helped us better understand each other and strengthen our bond.
questions.guidance: Approximate details are acceptable if exact dates are unclear.
questions.tooltip: Officers want to confirm the timeline of your relationship.

questions.question: How many times have you met in person?
questions.suggestedAnswer: We have met in person {{number_of_in_person_visits}} times, while maintaining consistent communication between visits.
questions.guidance: Be honest and approximate if unsure.
questions.tooltip: Officers assess commitment through in-person interaction.

questions.question: When did you first start talking?
questions.suggestedAnswer: We first started communicating regularly at the beginning of our relationship, which gradually developed into a serious commitment.
questions.guidance: Consistency matters more than exact dates.
questions.tooltip: Officers analyze the progression of the relationship over time.

questions.question: When did you get engaged?
questions.suggestedAnswer: We got engaged after spending sufficient time understanding each other and discussing our future together.
questions.guidance: Engagement can be formal or informal.
questions.tooltip: Engagement timing helps verify relationship progression.

questions.question: Walk me through your relationship timeline.
questions.suggestedAnswer: Our relationship progressed from initial communication to regular interaction, in-person meetings, engagement, and finally marriage.
questions.tooltip: Officers assess consistency across all answers.

questions.question: How and when did the proposal happen?
questions.suggestedAnswer: The proposal happened {{proposal_details}} and reflected our mutual commitment and long-term intentions.

questions.question: Why did you decide to get married?
questions.suggestedAnswer: We decided to get married because of mutual trust, shared goals, emotional support, and a desire to build a life together.
questions.tooltip: Officers ensure marriage intent is genuine.

questions.question: Tell me about your wedding.
questions.suggestedAnswer: Our wedding was celebrated with family and friends in {{marriage_location}}, reflecting our traditions and values.

questions.question: Did your families approve of this relationship?
questions.suggestedAnswer: Yes, both families were supportive and approved of our relationship and marriage.
questions.tooltip: Family approval can strengthen relationship credibility.

questions.question: Have you met your spouse’s family?
questions.suggestedAnswer: Yes, I have met my spouse’s family and maintain ongoing communication with them.

questions.question: How do you communicate when you are apart?
questions.suggestedAnswer: We communicate consistently through {{daily_communication}} to stay connected despite distance.

questions.question: What language do you and your spouse use to communicate?
questions.suggestedAnswer: We communicate comfortably in a shared language that allows us to understand each other clearly.

questions.question: What do you do together as a couple?
questions.suggestedAnswer: We enjoy shared activities such as {{shared_activities}}, supporting each other in daily life.

questions.question: What are your spouse’s hobbies and interests?
questions.suggestedAnswer: My spouse enjoys various activities and hobbies that we often discuss and sometimes enjoy together.

questions.question: What does your spouse do for a living?
questions.suggestedAnswer: My spouse works as {{sponsor_employment}} and maintains stable employment.

questions.question: Do you share finances?
questions.suggestedAnswer: We manage finances responsibly, making joint decisions where appropriate.
questions.guidance: Joint or separate accounts are both acceptable.

questions.question: Why do you want to move to the United States?
questions.suggestedAnswer: I want to live with my spouse and build a stable family life together in the United States.
questions.tooltip: Primary intent should align with petition purpose.

questions.question: What are your plans after arriving in the US?
questions.suggestedAnswer: I plan to settle with my spouse, integrate into the community, and contribute responsibly once authorized.

questions.question: Who will you leave behind in your home country?
questions.suggestedAnswer: I will leave behind family and social connections while maintaining ties through regular communication.

questions.question: Do you own property in your home country?
questions.suggestedAnswer: If applicable, I disclosed any property ownership honestly in my application.

questions.question: Have you ever been arrested or charged with any crime?
questions.suggestedAnswer: I have answered this question honestly and disclosed all relevant information.

questions.question: Have you ever served in the military?
questions.suggestedAnswer: If applicable, I have disclosed my service history truthfully.
questions.guidance: Military service is not negative by default.

questions.question: Have you ever been to the United States before?
questions.suggestedAnswer: If applicable, I have visited the US previously and complied with all visa conditions.

questions.question: Have you traveled internationally before?
questions.suggestedAnswer: Yes, I have traveled internationally while respecting visa laws of each country.

questions.question: What is your age difference with your spouse?
questions.suggestedAnswer: My age range is {{age_range}}, and our age difference reflects our compatible life stages.
questions.guidance: Focus on compatibility and shared life goals.

questions.question: What is your educational background?
questions.suggestedAnswer: My highest education is {{highest_education}}, which contributes to our shared intellectual interests.
questions.guidance: Highlight how education supports relationship stability.
questions.tooltip: Educational background may influence relationship dynamics.

questions.question: When did you get married?
questions.suggestedAnswer: We got married {{marriage_date}}, after spending {{months_since_marriage}} months in a committed relationship.
questions.guidance: Be consistent with your application documents.
questions.tooltip: Marriage timing affects relationship authenticity assessment.

questions.question: How did you meet your spouse?
questions.suggestedAnswer: We met {{relationship_origin_type}}, which led to a natural development of our relationship.
questions.guidance: Be specific about how you met.
questions.tooltip: Meeting story is fundamental to relationship verification.

questions.question: How long have you been in a relationship?
questions.suggestedAnswer: We have been together for {{total_time_spent_together}}, with regular in-person visits totaling {{number_of_in_person_visits}} times.
questions.guidance: Emphasize the consistent nature of your relationship.
questions.tooltip: Timeline consistency is crucial for relationship verification.

questions.question: How do you communicate with your spouse when apart?
questions.suggestedAnswer: We communicate {{communication_frequency}} using {{daily_communication}}, maintaining regular contact.
questions.tooltip: Communication patterns show ongoing relationship authenticity.

questions.question: How did both families react to your marriage?
questions.suggestedAnswer: Both families reacted positively to our marriage, as {{family_reaction_to_marriage}}.

questions.question: Who attended your wedding?
questions.suggestedAnswer: Our wedding was attended by {{wedding_attendees}}, reflecting our strong family and social connections.

questions.question: Do you have mutual friends?
questions.suggestedAnswer: Yes, we have mutual friends {{mutual_friends}}, who can attest to our relationship.
questions.guidance: Mention how you connect with mutual friends.
questions.tooltip: Mutual friends provide additional relationship verification.

questions.question: What is your petitioner immigration status?
questions.suggestedAnswer: The petitioner has {{petitioner_status}} status, demonstrating their ability to sponsor me.

questions.question: What is the household size?
questions.suggestedAnswer: Our household will consist of {{household_size}} members, with adequate financial support.
questions.tooltip: Household size affects financial support calculations.

questions.question: How will you be financially supported in the US?
questions.suggestedAnswer: We will be financially supported by the petitioner's income at the {{petitioner_income_level}} level, with a household size of {{household_size}}.
questions.tooltip: Financial support verification is critical for visa approval.

questions.question: Have you ever been refused a US visa?
questions.suggestedAnswer: {{previous_visa_refusal}}. If applicable, I have addressed the reasons for refusal in my current application.
questions.guidance: Be honest about any visa refusals.
questions.tooltip: Visa refusal history requires detailed explanation.

questions.question: Have you ever overstayed a visa in any country?
questions.suggestedAnswer: {{visa_overstay_history}}. If applicable, I have disclosed this honestly in my application.

questions.question: Have you ever been arrested or charged with a crime?
questions.suggestedAnswer: {{criminal_history}}. If applicable, I have fully disclosed this information in my application.

questions.question: Have you previously traveled to the United States?
questions.suggestedAnswer: {{previous_us_visits}}. If applicable, I have always complied with visa conditions during previous visits.
questions.guidance: Be truthful about US travel history.
questions.tooltip: US travel history is thoroughly verified.

questions.question: Do you share finances?
questions.suggestedAnswer: {{joint_finances}}. We manage our finances jointly/individually with transparency.
